XML::LibXML::ErrNo(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation XML::LibXML::ErrNo(3)

NAME

XML::LibXML::ErrNo - Structured Errors This module is based on xmlerror.h libxml2 C header file. It defines symbolic constants for all libxml2 error codes. Currently libxml2 uses over 480 different error codes. See also XML::LibXML::Error.

AUTHORS

Matt Sergeant, Christian Glahn, Petr Pajas
